heroText:
The Solution to Finding
Your Dream Home is Here
mostViewedSubtitle: We offer a wide selection of the newest properties ready for you to explore.
heroAboutTitle: Your Trusted Real Estate Partner in the Caribbean
heroAboutText: At Realtor Caribe, we specialize in turning your property dreams into reality. We offer a wide range of services, including the sale of existing homes, new housing projects, beach houses, apartments, studio apartments, commercial properties, land, and condos. Our comprehensive services also include helping you rent properties for short-term, tourism/vacation purposes, and long-term rentals. We provide essential maintenance and cleaning services to keep your properties in top condition. With extensive experience in project management, we possess a deep understanding of the real estate industry.
whyChooseUsPara1text: Explore our latest housing projects, including stunning beach houses, modern apartments, and luxurious condos. Our new properties are designed with the latest amenities and are located in prime areas to offer you the best living experience. Whether you're looking for a permanent residence or a vacation home, we have options that suit your lifestyle.
whyChooseUsPara2text: Our portfolio of existing homes includes a diverse selection of properties, from charming beachfront cottages to elegant city apartments. Each property is carefully selected to ensure quality and value. Let us help you find your perfect home, whether it's for personal use or investment purposes.
whyChooseUsPara3text: We provide a range of rental options to meet your needs, including short-term rentals for tourists, vacation rentals, and long-term leases. Our team also offers property management services, ensuring your rental properties are well-maintained and tenants are satisfied. Trust us to handle everything from marketing to maintenance, so you can enjoy a hassle-free rental experience.
banner: Your Dream Home Is In Front Of Your Eyes
callToActionText: Don't hesitate to contact our team for more information or to set up an appointment. We are ready to help you find your dream home
calcQues: How much is your property worth?
calcQuesDesc: Please provide the following details and we will contact you soon for an inspection.
calcThanksDesc: Thank you for your submission. We will contact you soon for an inspection.
name: Full Name
successMessage: Your property details have been received. Our team will review and contact you soon for further inspection.
aboutSubtitle: We specialize in connecting buyers, sellers, landlords, and tenants with properties that match their unique needs. Our platform transforms property search into a seamless, personalized experience.
missionText: Our objective is to make our clients' dreams come true through personalized real estate solutions. We are committed to offering a comprehensive service that allows them to achieve their goals and enjoy the beauty and charm of the Colombian Caribbean.
visionText: We aspire to be the leading real estate services company in the Colombian Caribbean, standing out for sustainable projects, exceptional quality service, and our contribution to the region's development.
choose1Text: We act responsibly and respectfully towards our clients and the environment. We strive to fulfill all our promises and maintain high ethical standards.
choose2Text: We constantly innovate to stay at the forefront of the market. We quickly adapt to changes and always seek improvement.
choose3Text: We foster transparent and secure relationships with all our clients. We prioritize integrity and reliability in all our interactions.
choose4Text: We strive to offer personalized solutions that exceed expectations. We listen carefully to our clients to understand and meet their needs.
choose5Text: We achieve optimal results with agile and effective processes. We value our clients' time and work to provide fast and accurate service.
choose6Text: We address all aspects of the real estate business to provide a complete and high-quality service. We are committed to offering a holistic experience that covers all our clients' needs.
aboutBanner: Ready to Find Your Dream Property?
aboutBannerText: Your perfect property is just a click away. Start your journey with us today.
getInTouchText: Fill up the form our team will get back to you within 24 Hours.
gloriaText: Public business administrator with over 17 years of experience in the real estate sector. A passionate leader who enjoys fostering team growth, with a strong commitment to professional ethics and personal development. Specializes in making families' real estate dreams come true.
ingridText: Business administrator with an MBA and a Postgraduate degree in Project Evaluation. Extensive experience in sales, management, and structuring of real estate projects. She has worked with prestigious companies such as Inversiones Burke Sanchez, Ospinas y Cia, and Proinmobiliaria. Specializes in helping clients find their ideal home.
glenisText: Business and logistics customs administrator specializing in real estate sales. Expert in commercial advice for used and off-plan projects. Focused on providing effective and personalized housing solutions for her clients' needs.
dayanaText: Social Communication professional with training in Communication Management and Content Production. Specializes in real estate sales, design, and customer service. Known for her focus on organizational communication, marketing, and teamwork commitment.
ibelisText: Business administrator in training with solid experience in real estate sales. Specializes in off-plan projects and is recognized for her natural leadership. Committed to helping clients achieve the dream of owning their ideal home.
aboutPropertyText: Discover all the features and amenities this property has to offer, from its basic specifications to its luxury comforts.
similarPropertiesText: Explore other properties that match your preferences and interests.
sharePropertyText: Share this amazing property with your friends
heroSubtitle: Flexible and hassle-free vacation rental management that optimizes your income. Request a quote now.
whyStayTitle: Why stay with Pass the Keys?
whyStaySubtitle: England's best-known full-service vacation rental management agency
cardCleaningDesc: Hotel quality, professionally laundered linens, all managed to an exceptional standard.
cardCustomerServiceDesc: We manage all guest communications, from check-in to check-out, so you don't have to get involved.
cardAdManagementDesc: Professional photos, continuously updated prices, and your property listed on 20 different platforms, including Airbnb and Booking.com.
cardPortalDesc: Full access to all your reservations, payments, and financial information. We even take photos after each cleaning so you can rest assured knowing your property is well cared for.
accommodationServicesTitle: What accommodation services does Pass the Keys offer?
accommodationServicesDesc: We can also provide additional services to help you manage your property, discuss pricing with your local account manager.
airbnbTitle: What is an Airbnb professional co-host?
airbnbDesc: Due to the size of our property portfolio and the consistent quality of our service, Pass the Keys® was invited to become an official Airbnb Co-Host in 2018. This exclusive status provided Pass the Keys with a key account manager and direct integration with their systems so we could dynamically update pricing, report on guest behavior, and other key metrics. We have retained our benefits as a valued partner even though Airbnb has since retired the program (2022).
vacationRentalSpainSubtitle: In Spain, there are thousands of towns, cities, and regions with high demand for vacation rental properties. As a host, you can increase the profitability of your property without doing any of the work.
whyHostCardDesc: Domestic and international travel has driven an increase in demand for vacation rental properties, allowing owners to maximize their income with Pass the Keys. Our local teams can help you take advantage of this profitable source of income.
whereProfitableCardTitle: Where in Spain is vacation rentals profitable?
whereProfitableCardDesc: Spain is home to some of the most sought-after destinations for international guests: demand for vacation rentals is high in both cities and rural and coastal destinations.
whyManagementCardTitle: Why use a vacation rental management company in Spain?
whyManagementCardDesc: A local vacation rental management company can help you optimize your pricing strategy to ensure you get the best possible revenue. We'll also ensure you achieve a high occupancy rate listing your property on various sites like Airbnb, Booking.com, and Vrbo.
spanishTerritoriesOwnersDesc: The UK's leading vacation rental management service for hosts has arrived in Spain.
